forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 39F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
